The full name of the college is PSGR Krishnammal College for Women, Coimbatore.
Admissions are based on merit. Students can apply online through the college website.
The college is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India.
You can contact the college office at 080-49251252 or email at hr@psgrkcw.ac.in.
The college is affiliated with Bharathiar University and accredited by NAAC.
The fee structure varies depending on the course. Please visit the Fees section or contact the college office.
The college offers UG and PG programs in Arts, Science, Commerce, and Computer Science.
Government and merit-based scholarships are available for eligible students. Check the Scholarships section for details.
The college provides placement assistance with training and campus recruitment opportunities.
Hostel facilities are available for students with food, security, and a study-friendly environment.
The college provides bus transport facility. Routes, timings, and transport fee details are available in the Transport section.
Exam schedules, hall tickets, results, and academic calendar are available in the Examination & Academics section.
The college provides excellent campus facilities including library, laboratories, sports, gym, medical aid, and cafeteria.
Student support services include grievance redressal, counseling, anti-ragging committee, student clubs, NSS/NCC, and women safety measures.
You can apply for bonafide, transfer, conduct, and course completion certificates via the college office or website.
The college conducts various events including cultural events, seminars, workshops, annual day, competitions, and industrial visits.

Admission is done mainly through online application via the official college website. Selection is based on merit, eligibility criteria, and reservation norms. Shortlisted candidates are called for counseling/admission confirmation.

Fees vary by course. Please visit the college office for specific details regarding your chosen programme.
The college has 30+ academic departments across Arts, Science, Commerce, Management, Computer Science, Languages, Social Work, Physical Education, and Research.
PSGRKCW offers 80+ courses, including UG, PG, Diploma, Certificate, M.Phil., and Ph.D. programmes.
